key.description: Registry key where the information is retrieved from.

key-last-write-time.description: Date and time when the key was last updated.

user-name.description: User name assigned to the user profile.

full-user-name.description: Full name assigned to the user profile.

last-login-time.description: Date and time when the user last logged onto the system.

pwd-reset-time.description: Date and time when the password was last reset.

pwd-fail-date.description: Date and time when a password last failed for this user profile.

login-count.description: Number of times the user logged-in onto the system.

comments.description: Full name assigned to the user profile.

description: Regripper Object template designed to present user profile details extracted from the SAM hive.
name: regripper-sam-hive-single-user
